_description: A song perhaps celebrating the birth of Prince Henry in A.D. 1511 — one 6-line tail-rhyme stanza

BLAdd31922.First Lines: A boffe all thyngenow lete vs syngeboth day and nyght…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …A dew mornynga dew mornynga dew now let us synga bud is spryngyngeoff the red rose and the whyght
